title: 2021 CAF Women's Champions League WAFU A Qualifiers
text:
The 2021 CAF Women's Champions League WAFU Zone A Qualifiers is the 1st edition of the WAFU Zone A women's club <a href="Association%20football">football</a> qualifier tournament organised by the <a href="West%20African%20Football%20Union">WAFU</a> for the women's clubs of association nations. This edition was held from 24 to 30 July 2021 in <a href="Mindelo">Mindelo</a>, <a href="Cape%20Verde">Cape Verde</a>. The winners of the tournament qualified for the <a href="2021%20CAF%20Women%27s%20Champions%20League">2021 CAF Women's Champions League</a> final tournament held in <a href="Egypt">Egypt</a>.
Participating teams.
The following four teams will contest in the qualifiyng tournament.
Match officials.
Referees
Assistant Referees
